_header: Who that buildeth his house all of sallows
Note: Same as Wife of Bath’s Prologue, 654-57.

CamStJohn235.Transcription:
Who that buyldeth hys house all of salowesAnd prichyth a blynd horse
                    ouer the falowesAnd suffreth hys wyfe to seke many halowesGod sende
                    hym the blys of euerlastyng galowes
CamStJohn235.Note:
Added to lower margin; followed by additional line, ‘Yf thyfe be
                    not dyrectyd thenne goe they at anentez’.
